pr_title: Terminate initial scan on stop active sync

timeline.bodyText: the same method also stops an incremental sync, so perhaps rename to make that clear?

timeline.bodyText: I think isInterrupted() clears the interrupt flag. If the previous syncInodeMetadata was interrupted, this would evaluate to false, and this whole method would return true. Is that desired?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: nope. the javadoc says the interrupted status is unaffected by this method. the method accepts a flag to indicate whether to clear the state
replies.author: madanadit
